tweets.content:
The recent flash crash exposed the truth: 
fast is easy, reliable is hard.
Itâ€™s still Uptober, but volatility has returned with a reminder â€“ what endures isnâ€™t hype, itâ€™s architecture.

ETH and BTC are free to trade, with zero fees to grow traders and flow.Daily trading competitions reward real PnL and open interest.

But fees are just the surface, the real story is the credible path to bringing global capital markets onchain with Ethereumâ€™s trading layer.

Architectures > slogans.
Speed matters. Security matters. But only architecture endures.

Today
Reya is a high-performance perp DEX leveraging the Arbitrum Orbit stack

Tomorrow 
Reya becomes Ethereumâ€™s trading layer â€” the worldâ€™s first trading specific based rollup.
Not an L2. A DEX enshrined in Ethereumâ€™s L1.

One trading system where retail and institutions can trade any market with millisecond execution and Ethereum-grade assurance.

Projects like Hyperliquid and Aster have shown how powerful fast, vertically integrated venues can be. Theyâ€™ve built deep liquidity and loyal users, proving the demand for onchain speed. Reya extends that proof by anchoring performance to Ethereum, where liquidity, infrastructure, and long-term trust already exist.

Real capital markets depend on three things.

Security and finality: Settlement and verification anchored to Ethereumâ€™s validator set, with a path to hundreds of thousands of validators sequencing and attesting to every trade.

Composability: Native integration with Ethereumâ€™s DeFi stack: LSTs, RWAs, restaking, and collateral innovation.

Distribution: Ethereum already has the builders, liquidity, and institutions. Reya connects directly to that network.

Fast is easy. Truly decentralised is hard. Reya is both.

Perp DEXs today compete for the same pool of traders. Reya widens the market.

CeFi-level execution with Ethereum-grade settlement lets traders move from custodial to self-custody without losing performance or taking on the risks of a small validator set.

That shift unlocks the full stack of onchain markets â€” perps, spot, staking, RWAs, and basis strategies â€” all under one unified margin system.

Ethereum still lacks a flagship L1-anchored perp venue. Reya is built to become that trading layer: fast, composable, and verifiable at the core of Ethereumâ€™s financial stack.

Today: a zero-gas, MEV-free perp DEX with yield-bearing margin.

Next: a trading specific based rollup with settlement verified by Ethereumâ€™s validator network, expanding toward a future of distributed sequencing and validator participation at scale.

Performance wins the moment.
Alignment wins the decade.
Reya is built for both â€” the execution layer of Internet Capital Markets. On Ethereum.

â€£ Ethereumâ€™s decentralization

â€£ CeFiâ€™s UX and capital efficiency
Into one unified, verifiable execution layer.

Transforming Ethereum from a passive settlement network into the foundation for you to access global capital markets fast, fair and sovereign in keeping with @ethereumfndn principles.

tweets.content:
â€œTrading-specificâ€

While most rollups are general-purpose, Reyaâ€™s trading-specific based rollup is optimized for the highest demands of trading: 

Latency. Liquidity. Throughput. 
All while maintaining Ethereum-grade security and transparency and liveness guarantees.

Reyaâ€™s architecture turns Ethereum into a high-performance trading engine with:
Millisecond block times 
â†’ 1ms ordering and execution.

Gasless trading 
â†’ no wallet pop-ups, no per-trade gas, just frictionless UX.

Unified margin and clearing logic 
â†’ cross-market netting, multi-asset collateral, and capital efficiency.

MEV-free design 
â†’ ensuring every order is executed fairly and verifiably.
tweets.author: reya_xyz

tweets.content:
Our Based Rollup makes Reya:

Ethereum-aligned 
â†’ inherits Ethereumâ€™s security and censorship resistance.
Trust-minimized 
â†’ no single point of failure or control.
Fair, Verifiable, MEV Proof and gasless

Reyaâ€™s based rollup doesnâ€™t just settle to Ethereum.
It lives on Ethereum.
tweets.author: reya_xyz

tweets.content:
â€œBased rollupâ€
Decentralization doesnâ€™t matter ...until it does

A based rollup derives sequencing and settlement directly from the Ethereum L1. Unlike typical L2s or app-chains, it doesnâ€™t depend on a small external or â€˜permissionedâ€™ sequencer set.

This difference is critical.
Most trading venues rely on a handful of operators to order transactions. If those few actors are compromised, coerced or offline for any reason: 
The market stalls.
Liquidity freezes.
Your access disappears.

Reya removes that risk.
As a based rollup, sequencing happens via Ethereum itself â€“ secured by hundreds of thousands of validators. No 'trusted' middlemen. 
No regulatory chokepoints. 
No downtime.

Reya introduces rUSD & srUSD - two core stablecoin primitives powering settlement, liquidity, and capital efficiency across the Network.
